select b.id,a.mac mac,b.rssi rssi,date_format(a.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as time from ( select mac,max(time) as time from info group by mac)a left join info b on a.mac=b.mac and a.time=b.time
having a.mac in (select p_mac from s_p where s_id=#{id})

select a.id,a.mac,a.rssi,date_format(a.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as time from (select id,rssi,mac,time from info where info.time > NOW()-INTERVAL #{hour} HOUR) a where a.mac in (select p_mac from s_p where s_id=#{id})

select a.id,a.mac,a.rssi,date_format(a.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as time from (select id,rssi,mac,time from info where info.time > NOW()-INTERVAL #{minute} MINUTE) a where a.mac in (select p_mac from s_p where s_id=#{id})
